body: At the start of the new year, Jamaican blogger Ruthibelle contemplates "a people who must live not as they want, but as they are compelled to by 'circumstances beyond their control'".
original_body: At the start of the new year, Jamaican blogger Ruthibelle contemplates "a people who must live not as they want, but as they are compelled to by 'circumstances beyond their control'".
title: Jamaica: broken dreams
